storyInfo: Milliarium, an Ægirian city, takes the initiative in contacting land, inviting envoys from Iberia to the sea. In order to resolve the Seaborn issue, Ægir plans to open a Waterway to connect the ocean and dry land. At the same time, Ulpianus appears in a nearby stretch of sea.

attributes.text: A hunter is walking on seacoast way♪
With homeland left a mile behind, his path lies ahead♪
From his forebears and children, he was torn♪
Into the seas his lover was swept away, floating in the deep, dead♪
A hunter is walking on seacoast way♪
With homeland left a mile behind, they must lament and pray♪
There is no end to his path♪
The road ahead is shrouded in gray♪
A hunter returns by seacoast way♪
His journey ended, his home close at hand♪
Sound of waves past above the spray♪
Why do his feet disobey his command♪
Why ever does his heart still sway♪

attributes.options: Long time no see, Skadi.;Hello, Skadi.

attributes.content: Been a while, Doctor.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: You were supposed to meet that chatty Liberi, but you don't seem surprised to see me.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.options: You and Elysium are both Rhodes operators.;This is a lot closer to your homeland, after all.

attributes.content: Hmm. True.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: You're an hour later than Kal'tsit estimated.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I guess the Inquisition's review process is strict, even with an official notice from a Saint.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: After only three months, nearly all the town's residents have moved inland, aside from a few workers. Replaced by lots of people from the Penal Battalion.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.options: They must be preparing for something.;They look pretty tense.

attributes.content: Ægir contacted Iberia a week ago. This forgotten town has become a lot less quiet since.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Being surrounded by sea scum already sets the young soldiers on edge. Hearing Ægir's voice only made it worse.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.options: It demands a response, maybe caution.;When the undersea nation finally speaks, you have to listen.

attributes.content: Turn left at the sculpture, and the sea is a quick ten minute walk.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: We'll head straight to the Eye of Iberia.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Say, Doctor, do you hear the sound of the waves?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Skadi turns her head slightly into the sea breeze. Her hair dances in the wind, the same color as the shadows in her eyes.
Their layering has gotten complex. I hear... the sound of stars drifting across the sky. The never-ending song of nature. And a language, forever incomprehensible...
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.text: The hardship we suffer is ever present.
The life we thirst for is ever present.

attributes.options: Are you alright, Skadi?;Did reconnecting with home put you on edge?

attributes.content: It's like I get more nervous the closer I am... Never mind. It's hard to explain.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Maybe I'm sleep-deprived. Ever since our last voyage, I feel like I've inherited Shark's nightmares.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Speaking of the sea, why did Dr. Kal'tsit call you over so urgently?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I don't remember you having anything to do with the ocean.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.options: I wouldn't recall even if I did.;But it doesn't feel unfamiliar, at least.

attributes.content: Not much of an answer.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Right, I forgot about your condition. No wonder you gave such an answer.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Oh well. I'm sure she had her reasons.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Let's go. It'll be dark soon.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I would take a step back if I were you. I need to shake myself dry.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Hey there, Dr. Kal'tsit. Not many people can track us Abyssal Hunters. Did Swordfish tell you we'd be coming ashore here in advance?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Elysium deployed a data collector in these waters. It's had a direct connection to the Eye of Iberia's central control system ever since its calibration.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And it can already track underwater targets? That Liberi's not half-bad.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Am I to understand then that Rhodes Island and the Inquisition have deepened their ties?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: One week ago, the undersea city contacted Iberia via a special comms frequency, informing them that Ægir would be establishing a 'Waterway' between the Ægir home territories and dry land.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: In the face of such a grand project, Iberia could only gather intelligence through the great lighthouse's positioning system.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Evidently, your position as Chief Designer of Warfare did not afford you any knowledge of this.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Tell Kal'tsit what we discovered, Shark.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: The captain and I have swum out to where the Stultifera sank three times now. Our last dive was only ten days ago.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: The first time, we could still see the exploded wreckage on the sea floor. Under what little light filtered through from the surface, the gilded interior was more like a smudge of paint.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: But this time around, the entire thing had completely disappeared, replaced by a cluster of coral, thrumming with life.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I may be accustomed to dreaming, but that felt unreal even to me.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: That monument to a lost civilization and its history stood for but a brief time.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: The Stultifera Navis has been completely claimed by the sea.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Or to be precise, it's become part of a Seaborn nest.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Their environmental assimilation is accelerating.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: At a frightening pace.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: But there was something even more noteworthy. We found traces of battle. Recent ones.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: A completely barren patch of sea, lacking even marine snow. A warped and shattered stretch of sea floor, clearly pockmarked by micro-singularities.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Only the fleets of Ægir's Legions could be behind that.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: As a landwalker, Kal'tsit, the knowledge of and interest you hold towards Ægir are nothing less than extraordinary.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Though separated by the boundless seas, Ægir has always been a part of Terra.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Regardless, Gladiia and I have decided to head to that city.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: A risky decision, no doubt.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Perhaps a tad.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Considerably.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: As such, we Hunters have been observing it for a while.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Before our final operation, I attended a military conference between the Academy of Science and the Academy of Technology, as the Abyssal Hunters' Chief Designer of Warfare.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Among the battle plans they drew up together, I do not recall anyone calling for a military stronghold to approach dry land with, nor any project involving 'Waterways.'
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Ægir has, without a doubt, undergone great changes.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Our contact with the home territories was completely severed after we slew Ishar'mla. It is difficult to determine the truth of the matter from the information we possess.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Yet still hardly reason enough for you to return to Ægir. I don't believe I'm the first to try to dissuade you, either. Didn't your colleague already do so?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Do you mean... Ulpianus?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: He would understand that the land holds no answers for us. We must return to the sea.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: If his strategy is to maintain a distance from Ægir, then all the more reason for us to return in an official capacity.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: ...Ever since I awoke from my dream, the waves would tell me, time and again, that the lost should return home.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: The Abyssal Hunters must return.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Very well, I understand.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Then I'll go with you, Gladiia.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That would indeed be a rare opportunity for you.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I will be representing more than myself on this visit. More than Rhodes Island, even.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Iberia as well? Even with all that you already bear, they would give you another burden?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: It was also my decision.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Rhodes Island's cooperation with the Iberian Inquisition has only just begun. Much like our own.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kal'tsit stares at Gladiia. The Hunter's face remains devoid of expression, even the blowing sea wind failed to crease it.
After a short moment of silence, Gladiia nods her head.
How many days has it been since we were contacted by Ægir, Irene?
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Eight, Su Santidad.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: And outside of the necessary deployments, meetings, and to rest, you've spent those eight days here, watching the sea.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: They haven't given us a concrete time frame for their next contact. I understand you don't wish to miss their next move, but...
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Look at the sea before you, Irene.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: The colors of the deep sea bubble up, nearly indistinguishable from one another. Against the vastness of the ocean surface, the sky seems gloomy.
The water crash against the reef, whipping up waves several meters tall, their roars dashing against this small corner of the land.
By Iberian standards, an ocean without a hint of Sea Terror flesh is a gentle one, no matter how noisy it may be.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: An old friend of mine was once the most talented bard of the port.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: But after that grand port sank into Silence, he fled north, past the starving masses to the Iberian interior, to the small town that would one day become the capital.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: I saw him kneeling by the broken town gates, weeping uncontrollably. From his weeping, the town obtained its new name: Perdonidora. 'Forgiveness has left us.'
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: However, what people needed at the time was not mourning, but consolation. Many prefer to use the shortened form, Perdoni. 'Forgiveness.'
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: And now, the last Eye of Iberia, the final legacy of the Golden Age, shines bright once more. What do you think that signals, Irene?
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Hope and determination.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: 'Hope and determination.' Of course.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Ah, youth. The determination in your eyes is brighter than Dario's when he was your age. Good, good.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: But those words, as inspiring as they are, are often not the fully correct answer.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: After half a century of being pushed back, our front is finally advancing. Soon, this will become the new center of the Inquisition.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: But at the same time, we must necessarily bare everything to the ocean. To Seaborn and Ægir alike.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Iberia is stretched thin. This country can no longer hide its exhaustion and sickness. It is a simple fact, plain for all to see.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: And there is another fact to consider. We can retreat no further.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Maestro—Ah, it's been a while, Doña Irene.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Indeed it has.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Those clothes suit you.
attributes.name: Irene
Jordi
attributes.content: Th-Thank you.

attributes.name: Jordi
attributes.content: Ah, right, there's been an emergency. The lighthouse just picked up signals of unknown origin.
They seem to be coming from not the sea, but the sky.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Jordi. I think we can already seen them...
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Carmen and Irene are fixated on the distant sky. The young clerk follows suit.
He freezes on the spot.
They see a school of fins soaring through the sky.
What are they?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Bionic drones. The Islanders brought similar creations to land, all those years ago.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: The matrix of drones crosses the sea in the blink of an eye, matching the height of the towering lighthouse. One separates itself from the formation and slowly hovers before the three.
Its wings open and close like fins, like a speck of light dancing in the void, and soon after an amiable and charismatic female voice resounds from it.
(Iberian) People of Iberia. Do not be alarmed.
Ægir greets you.
I am Clementia, a technology consul of our Institute of Societal and Administrative Supervision.
Carmen holds his lantern aloft, looking serenely at the drone before him.
Two completely different forms of light face each other, as though in a dialogue between two different civilizations—or a confrontation.
Saint Carmen I Iberia, of the Iberian Inquisition.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: I believe this is the first official communication between our nations.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Indeed.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: You speak our tongue as well as any Iberian.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: I installed an Iberian language module before leaving the home territories. I hope you'll forgive me if I ever use the wrong expression.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Moreover, forgive me for having to contact you in this form, Sir... Iberia.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: We have no objections to your appearance, Madame Consul. I only regret that it has taken us so long to begin this conversation.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Despite your so-called 'Waterway' project being more than half-complete and close at hand, we Iberians find ourselves in complete ignorance of it.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: To make amends, we'd like to invite your envoys to visit our city. Ægir respects the efforts Iberia has made when you were caught up in the Seaborn crisis.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: 'Caught up in.' Do you mean to say that everything Iberia has faced was merely the aftermath of your crisis?
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: I do.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Let's not be tied down by formalities, Sir.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: We recognize the power of language. Your name itself, Carmen I Iberia, is a symbol. A symbol of courage and valor.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: This is why we came to you. We hope that by reaching an accord with Iberia and the other terrestrial nations, we will be able to create a Waterway that links directly to land.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: We will clear the stretch of sea between Ægir's home territories and the land, so as to facilitate our forces coming ashore.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: ...I hope I need not remind you what sending an army to another nation's border implies on land.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Given the enormity of the oncoming threat, we will exhaust every means at our disposal to resist it.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: I am more than willing to come explain to you in person if necessary, but it would be easier for you to understand the situation if you were to join us in the depths.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: The fleets of our Legions VIII and X are patrolling and suppressing the Seaborn in these waters. They will soon escort you to our city of Milliarium.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: This drone formation will continue to notify you of any nearby combat or environmental changes until you have safely arrived at the city.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: There may be an unprecedented disaster brewing beneath the waves.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Sir Inquisitor, I worry that though the earth is vast, it is but an isolated island.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: The lights of the drone matrix cut out, putting a stop to their sudden communication.
The sea breeze continues to blow as the old man slowly lowers his lantern.
'A Waterway that links directly to land.' She's eloquent, but...
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Arrogant. No doubt.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: A haughty adult wielding a weapon, loathe to use finesse when dealing with an unarmed child.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Irene, inform our cooperation partners of this most recent communication.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Kal'tsit has already agreed to serve as Iberia's envoy. The Abyssal Hunters should also have made their decision by now, considering they've always had reservations about the Waterway program.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Right away!
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: I'll also keep the other Inquisitors in Gran Faro abreast of the situation.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: I've made a recording of your entire conversation with Ægir, Maestro. Please, take a look.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: A-As for whether you approve of me going...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: I recall you submitted your application a week ago.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Yes. Since the Ægir fleet is on their way now, I was wondering if...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Never hesitate when you've already made up your mind. It only makes you less persuasive.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: When I was younger, Uncle Thiago was always worrying about me. He'd tell me: 'Jordi, you should leave Gran Faro. Leave Iberia.'
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: But he never told me where to go.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Ægir was always my homeland under the sea, but I had no way of approaching it. I'd never heard the voice of Ægir, or seen its cities.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: But now, it's so, so close.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: The Inquisition has approved your application, Jordi Fontanarossa. You will serve as an envoy of Iberia, and accompany Irene and Kal'tsit to the Ægir city.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Thank you, Maestro.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Don't thank me. This isn't a reward. Your work since joining the Inquisition has not been particularly good.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: I chose Irene because she has already readied herself, even going as far as to renounce her long-standing faith.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: And I chose you because you are still bewildered and frustrated. Your weakness will consume you.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Joining the Inquisition was a test. Returning to your homeland is another.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: I... I understand.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: (Agitated whinny)
attributes.name: Rocinante

attributes.content: This is the deepest part of the trench.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: They hollowed out its sides to make their nest. That's why we never noticed it before, despite circling this place several times.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: (Wary whinny)
attributes.name: Rocinante

attributes.content: Yes. I smell it too.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: This scent... After destroying the ocean's native ecosystem, the Seaborn have created a new one that serves only them.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: A comprehensive Seaborn ecosystem, where once it only existed in an oceanic abyss.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Return, Rocinante. I will carry on alone.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: (Swaying its neck in annoyance)
attributes.name: Rocinante

attributes.content: The entire continental shelf has changed. I must know who churned these waves.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Tell the Knight to continue the hunt.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: We will not be parted for long.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Ulpianus swims into the nest.
He chooses not to use stealth. Luminescent vegetative Seaborn light up every corner of the nest. There is nowhere to hide in the first place.
Atop sets of spiraling blades, minute and curiously-shaped organisms sleep, or perhaps drift along.

The rocks of the seafloor cannot be seen. The fine tendrils of the nethersea brand slowly sway in the current, catching fragments of organic matter. They weave together into thick mats, drowning out any sound Ulpianius makes.
He can sense the changes in his own body. His consciousness extends and his body relaxes, as though every cell in his body is trying to respond to something.
He is clearly an invader, but the entire lair blooms in response to him.
Ul... Ul-pian... Guh... Ul-pianus. Kin.
attributes.name: Seaborn

attributes.content: Ulpianus is nearly able to see through the approaching Seaborn's translucent body. He waits for it to spit out its clumsy words about preying or being preyed on by him, but nothing comes.
The Seaborn thinks about his thoughts.
Finally. You have traveled far.
attributes.name: Seaborn

attributes.content: Here. Sufficient nutrients. Shed your cumbersome flesh.
attributes.name: Seaborn

attributes.content: Return. Grow. Migrate.
attributes.name: Seaborn

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: For you, I was born, Ul-pianus. Only for you.
attributes.name: Seaborn

attributes.content: I untangle your. Doubt. I guide you. Return to the embrace of we many.
attributes.name: Seaborn

attributes.content: Why did you migrate? Where will you go?
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: You still waver, Ul-pianus.
attributes.name: Seaborn

attributes.content: You must know we many, kin. You must know.
attributes.name: Seaborn

attributes.content: The genesezoic will soon awaken. The genesezoic must return. A new Cycle. Develop the ocean. Leave the ocean.
attributes.name: Seaborn

attributes.content: The genesezoic will awaken? Leave the ocean?
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: We many. See. A new path ahead. We hurry—
attributes.name: Seaborn

attributes.content: ...What connection is there between you and the affairs of the city?
attributes.name: Ulpianus
